title: Super high MS (not net problem)
body:
So my internet is perfectly fine and when I start a league game it is about 60 ms
But when I get 16-20 min in the game my MS goes up to the point where i can't move
sometimes i can leave the game and close outta of LoL and relog and it will work but stop after 16-20 but it doesn't work everytime and I can't just leave every game.

plz help. 
sincerely a sad poro ;(.

edit: only happens on the weekend maybe its just a net problem

replies.body: It's always a good first step to do some general network troubleshooting just in case something funky is going on with your settings or ISP. Go ahead and update your port forwarding and DNS settings following the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know how that's able to help.
